rooms.name: Open-Plan Living, Dining & Kitchen Area
rooms.description: This room integrates living space with dining and kitchen areas. Designed for natural light and ventilation using large windows on the south and west facades following Vastu principles. The area facilitates an open-concept layout.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious bedroom designed for relaxation with eastern orientation to benefit from morning sunlight as per Vastu. It includes built-in wardrobes and ample windows for ventilation.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable guest bedroom with adequate natural light and privacy. Windows are placed to ensure airflow while maintaining a calm atmosphere.

rooms.name: Master Bathroom
rooms.description: Adjacent to the master bedroom, designed for functionality and natural light. Ventilation is ensured with windows placed strategically.

openings.description: Main entrance aligned with the Vastu principles, facing east or north as per site orientation.
Large windows for ample natural light and ventilation in the open-plan area.
Sliding doors connecting bedrooms to a central corridor, ensuring smooth transition while maintaining privacy.
